body:
Sorry for the interruption.

FWIW:

This is not the issue related to `GetLongPathName`, 
but `GetShortPathName` as "outputWithPrintln.txt" clarifying.

There is a report explaining same situation:

http://blogs.msdn.com/b/winsdk/archive/2013/10/09/getshortpathname-doesn-t-return-short-path-name.aspx

So, I guess registry settings are key points.
